title: Is it easy to find a decent house in Belgium? - Quora

response.answer_text: Depending on whether you're looking to rent a house or buy property I'd say it's quite easy to find decent houses in Belgium. Websites like immoweb.be are quite easy to use and find what you're looking for. Beware of scammers, always ask for an appointment first before you sign anything, ensure thouroughly during your visit whether it is in fact what you're looking for. Do not make any payments online or before signing your contract
